text: Gaŋgɨikɨk fopɨle guanɨk kameltɨn love salavakalen ka balakaŋgale. Miyakavik lua wusandaŋ tonmale yetɨk balañjɨkɨn Gotkɨk watɨk avik lovapa. Kape katɨk lua towok tonmale balañjɨkɨn Gotkɨk watɨk ta lovale wulun kameltɨn gaŋgɨikɨk fopɨle guanɨk love salavale wulu matɨkakalɨwa.” Kamel galavale jakali kavik tonma
